properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from High Island to Freeport TX out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX out 20 NM; Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from High Island to Freeport TX from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 20 at 3:19AM CST until February 21 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, northeast winds 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and seas 7 to 10 feet expected. For the Small
Craft Advisory, north winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt
and seas 4 to 6 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel
TX out 20 NM, Coastal waters from High Island to Freeport TX
out 20 NM, Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX
from 20 to 60 NM and Waters from High Island to Freeport TX
from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 3 PM this afternoon to 6 AM
CST Friday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 9 AM this
morning to 3 PM CST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY
